Module org.panteleyev.fx
Package org.panteleyev.fx

Class BaseDialog<R>

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.control.Dialog<R>
org.panteleyev.fx.BaseDialog<R>
Type Parameters:
R - The return type of the dialog, via the result property.
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.event.EventTarget
public class BaseDialog<R> extends javafx.scene.control.Dialog<R>
Base class for dialogs.

  • Method Details

    • createDefaultButtons

      protected void createDefaultButtons(ResourceBundle rb)
      Creates OK and Cancel buttons. Supplied resource bundle must define "button.Cancel" resource for Cancel translation.
      Parameters:
      rb - resource bundle

    • createDefaultButtons

      protected void createDefaultButtons(ResourceBundle rb, javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyBooleanProperty validationInvalidProperty)
      Creates OK and Cancel buttons. Supplied resource bundle must define "button.Cancel" resource for Cancel translation.
      Parameters:
      rb - resource bundle
      validationInvalidProperty - invalid property for validation support
